      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String url)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.text.ParseException
        Gets a pre-loaded User that matches the given URL or loads a new instance.
        Parameters:
        url - the user's profile URL.
        Returns:
        the user instance.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - there was an error loading the user.
        java.text.ParseException - there was an error loading the user's join date.

      • loadUser

              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.text.ParseException
        Loads the given URL into a User object.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to load.
        Returns:
        the user object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - there was an error loading the user.
        java.text.ParseException - there was an error loading the user's join date.

      • getDetails

        private java.lang.Object[] getDetails(java.lang.String url)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.text.ParseException
        Loads details on the given user.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL of the user.
        Returns:
        the details in this order:
        [aboutMe, subscribers, profile-views, xp, level, class joinDate]
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - there was an error loading the details.
        java.text.ParseException - there was an error getting the join date.
